documentType.label: other
reasons: Page contains policy definitions and descriptive paragraphs rather than invoice, CMR, or UB-04 form fields.
Layout is prose with bulleted lists and headings typical of an insurance policy document.

fields.name: You, Your definition
fields.value: You, Your means the person (or persons, for joint coverage) named as the insured(s) on the Benefit Schedule.

fields.name: We, Us, Our definition
fields.value: We, Us, Our means Allianz Life Insurance Company of North America.

fields.name: ADLs header
fields.value: Activities of Daily Living (ADLs) are the following:

fields.name: ADL - Bathing
fields.value: Bathing: washing oneself by sponge bath; or in either a tub or shower, including the task of getting into or out of the tub or shower.

fields.name: ADL - Continence
fields.value: Continence: the ability to maintain control of bowel and bladder function; or, when unable to maintain control of bowel or bladder function, the ability to perform associated personal hygiene (including caring for catheter or colostomy bag).

fields.name: ADL - Dressing
fields.value: Dressing: putting on and taking off all items of clothing and any necessary braces, fasteners, or artificial limbs.

fields.name: ADL - Eating
fields.value: Eating: feeding oneself by getting food into the body from a receptacle (such as a plate, cup or table) or by a feeding tube or intravenously.

fields.name: ADL - Toileting
fields.value: Toileting: getting to and from the toilet, getting on and off the toilet, and performing associated personal hygiene.

fields.name: ADL - Transferring
fields.value: Transferring: moving into or out of a bed, chair, or wheelchair.

fields.name: Adult Day Care header
fields.value: Adult Day Care is a program of services provided through an Adult Day Care Center that includes:

fields.name: Adult Day Care bullets
fields.value: care for six (6) or more individuals; and; health-related services; and; Maintenance or Personal Care Services; and; recreational and social services provided during the day in a community group setting.

fields.name: Adult Day Care purpose
fields.value: The purpose of such a program is to support frail, impaired elderly or other disabled adults who can benefit from care in a group setting outside the home.

fields.name: Adult Day Care Center definition
fields.value: Adult Day Care Center is a facility licensed under state law, if any, to provide Adult Day Care. It provides Adult Day Care services to adults who do not require 24-hour institutional care, but are not capable of full-time, independent living.

fields.name: Assisted Living Facility header
fields.value: Assisted Living Facility is a facility engaged primarily in providing ongoing care and related services, to adults who require such services, in one location, and which meets all of the following criteria:

fields.name: Assisted Living Facility bullets
fields.value: provides services for a period exceeding 24 hours; and; provides continuous room and board (e.g., housing and food services); and; provides Maintenance or Personal Care required by residents due to their inability to perform the Activities of Daily Living or due to Cognitive Impairment; and; is licensed under Florida law to provide such care as described.
